description: Detect creation of dump files containing the memory space of lsass.exe, which contains sensitive credentials. Identifies usage of Sysinternals procdump.exe to export the memory space of lsass.exe which contains sensitive credentials.
name: LSASS Memory Dumping
query: (((process.command_line:*lsass* AND process.command_line:*.dmp*) AND (NOT (process.executable:*\\werfault.exe))) OR (process.executable:*\\procdump* AND process.executable:*.exe AND process.command_line:*lsass*))
author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections
Tony Lambert)
oscd.community
